title: Rebirth – City Cultivation - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Romance   School Life   Xianxia
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Alchemy   Arrogant Characters   Average-looking Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Bloodlines   Body Tempering   Charismatic Protagonist   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Dao Comprehension   Demons   Gore   Heavenly Tribulation   Hiding True Identity   Immortals   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Multiple Realms   Overpowered Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Reincarnation   Returning from Another World   Revenge   Ruthless Protagonist   Second Chance   Underestimated Protagonist   Unique Cultivation Technique   Unique Weapons   Wars   Weak to Strong   World Travel
author: Shili Jian Shen   Ten miles swords god   十里劍神
description:
The Great Cultivator, Chen Fan, had failed to ascend during his Tribulation period, but after a dream, he returned to Earth five hundred years ago, back when he was younger.

“In my past life, I had reached the apotheosis of the universe. I had looked down upon the myriad of worlds, with no one accompanying me. In this life, I wish for both.”>
